remarks: There are no lines in dimension 0.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Oct-2019.)
statement:
tglineelsb2.p $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglineelsb2.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglineelsb2.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.

tglndim0 $p |- ( ph -> -. A e. ran L ) $.
